text: Is there anyway to automate meeting/activity data? For example have as default that the meeting should be the visiting address or the name to start with the account name? Aslo pre set meeting outcome?

Hello Flocks,

We are honored to announce it as one of the top <https://www.linkedin.com/company/HubSpot/|HubSpot> apps in the new Customizable <https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=crm&highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6930475162395914241|#CRM> collection has launched <https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=formpay&highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6930475162395914241|#FormPay>
<https://app-eu1.HubSpot.com/ecosystem/25789247/marketplace/apps/marketing/ecommerce/formpay-754041>

No more manual effort need to do. All of the <https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=payment&highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6930475162395914241|#payment> information is synced to <https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=HubSpot&highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6930475162395914241|#HubSpot> contacts and deals, so you can search, segment, and run <https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=reports&highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6930475162395914241|#reports> inside HubSpot.

If you are looking for nifty <https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=apps&highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6930475162395914241|#apps> to take payments, create proposals, influence calls and SMS within HubSpot, and multiple gateways, Get in touch with <https://www.linkedin.com/company/makewebbetter/|MakeWebBetter >for customizing a set of payment gateways according to your requirements.

Check out this. It’s very easy to make faster, smoother, and simpler payments for your customers.

And the highlighted features are:
• Donation feature: keeps all the donors on your website and get the nonprofit payments.
- Custom Formatting
- Fee Recovery
- Unlimited Donation Forms
- Double the Donation / Company Matching
- Recurring Donations
- Additional Form Fields
- PDF Receipts

Thanks for engaging here!

Reminder: Did you know you can message <@U02162GK9SP|sprocky> at any time to get HubSpot development questions answered? It’s an experimental chat bot built to tackle developer questions. It won’t read your code, but can answer a lot of questions about building on the HubSpot platform.
Anybody else seeing this? Status page says there is no outage, app says there is.
yes. i am= getting this too. aftera c couple refreshes, it wanted me to login and I got this.
refreshing my browser cache fixed it. they must've released something that conflicted with cached data
I'm only seeing this in one portal, in others it has been fine. Even though I can see the error message, I can still access all the tools

Now that I’m almost done creating pages in the HubSpot Site Tree I shall confirm:  there isn’t a way to import  a site tree?  Like specific path, template, title etc in a CSV and import?  I know you can import blog posts but I haven’t found anything for website pages and this is horribly tedious.
Hi there, new dev here. I want to know what this is for and where can I find docs about it

It’s to create a new serverless function
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/data/serverless-functions>
Whenever you swap out an image on a page in the page editor, it should break the page cache, right? So people will see the new image.

if you replaced the image with an image that has the same file name, the old image will take longer to clear out of the server cache and be replaced.

if you replaced it with a new image that has a different file name it should show up immediately.
